attributes.action: We need an independent inquiry into Ffos y Fran to assess environmental impact
attributes.additional_details: We also need to understand what environmental impacts this is and could cause in its current state
attributes.background: Government need to ascertain the roles and accountabilities that have led to Ffos Y Fran opencast not being properly reinstated as per the original plan.

rejection.details:
We have to reject petitions that call for action at a local level.

You may also wish to raise this issue with your local Members of the Senedd who represent you. You can find out who your Members of the Senedd are and how to contact them here: https://senedd.wales/find-a-member-of-the-senedd/
